articles.title: Enlarged Meeting of Central Military Commission of WPK Held under Guidance of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Enlarged Meeting of Central Military Commission of WPK Held under Guidance of Kim Jong Un
						
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- An enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea was held under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present there were members of the WPK Central Military Commission, staff members of the KPA Supreme Command and commanding officers of the large combined units including the navy, air force and anti-air force and strategic rocket force.
					
					 The enlarge meeting of the WPK Central Military Commission discussed the issue of bringing about a great turn in bolstering up the military capability, true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the WPK, and an organizational issue.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made an important concluding speech which serves as guidelines for further strengthening the KPA into a matchless revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and defending the security and sovereignty of the country as required by the WPK and the developing revolution.
					
					 After listening to the historic speech made by Kim Jong Un with great excitement, the participants in the meeting extended highest glory and deepest thanks to Kim Jong Un, who is ushering in the greatest heyday of increasing the military capability with his extraordinary wisdom and stratagem, matchless grit and pluck and noble virtues and evinced their firm determination to unconditionally and thoroughly implement the militant tasks set forth by him in his speech. 
					
					 The enlarged meeting of the WPK Central Military Commission held at an important time when a turning phase is being opened in building a thriving socialist nation and achieving the cause of national reunification will mark an important occasion in powerfully encouraging the army and people of the DPRK all out in the general advance of the new year full of conviction of certain victory and optimism and bolstering up the defence capability of the country in every way.

articles.title: Greetings to Sri Lankan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Sri Lankan President
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Sri Lankan President Mahinda Rajapaksa on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields in the future in conformity with the common interests of the two peoples and sincerely wished the president and people of Sri Lanka success in their work for achieving the political stability and economic development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Sri Lankan Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Sri Lankan Prime Minister
						
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim on Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Sri Lankan Prime Minister D. M. Jayaratne on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the country's independence.
					 The message wished the prime minister greater success in his work to achieve the economic development of the country and bring the people's life to normal.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to his Sri Lankan counterpart G. L. Peris.

articles.title: New Year Cards to Kim Jong Un from Party and State Leaders of Different Countries
articles.content:
New Year Cards to Kim Jong Un from Party, State Leaders of Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received New Year cards from party and state leaders of different countries.
					 They included the presidents of Lebanon, Bangladesh, Pakistan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Armenia, king of Jordan, presidents of Indonesia and Vietnam, prime minister of Malta, president of Belarus, captains regent of San Marino, presidents of Guinea, Malawi, Burkina Faso, Algeria, Angola, Uganda, Nicaragua and Mexico, general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Syria, general chairman and secretary general of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, general secretary of the C.C., the All-India Forward Bloc, the secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Malta, chairman of the C.C., the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia, general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Portugal and the national secretary of the Socialist Workers' Party of the United States of America.
					
					 Kim Jong Un also received New Year cards from the UN secretary general, chairman of the South Center Committee, director general of the World Intellectual Property Organization, director general of UNESCO and the director of the Regional Office for South-East Asia of WHO.
					
					 He received a congratulatory message from the Ethiopian president.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Lambasted for Its Vicious Moves for Escalating Confrontation
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Lambasted for Its Vicious Moves for Escalating Confrontation
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea is getting hell-bent on the moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen till the end of its office, not content with bringing the inter-Korean relations to a collapse. It will not be able to escape deadly retaliation and sledge hammer blows from fellow countrymen.
					 Minju Joson Sunday says this in a bylined commentary. It goes on:
					
					 The Lee group is becoming more desperate in its moves in the wake of the resolute steps for self-defence taken by the DPRK categorically rejecting the UN "resolution" adopted against it over its successful launch of Kwangmyongsong 3-2.
					
					 The group is getting more vicious and desperate in its racket for confrontation with fellow countrymen, terming the DPRK's steps for self-defence to safeguard the sovereignty of the country and the nation an "additional provocation", far from apologizing for its first provocation against the DPRK. 
					
					 The group is threatening and blackmailing the DPRK, talking about "resolution on sanctions so harsh that the north can hardly hold off" and "sanctions against the north" which surpasses the recent UN "resolution." 
					
					 Judging from the behavior of the Lee group whose ouster is just at hand, forsaken by the nation, no one can predict what shocking incident will break out on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 In this case the group more dead than alive will face its doom earlier than expected.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Accused of Releasing Scandal-tainted Criminals
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Accused of Releasing Scandal-tainted Criminals 
						
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The Joint Action for Releasing Prisoners of Conscience in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 30 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for releasing criminals convicted of irregularities and corruption under the pretext of "special amnesty."
					 At the press conference the organization accused Lee of granting "special amnesty" to his close confidants, businessmen, ultra-rightist elements and family members who had been punished for irregularities and corruption for the past five years of his office.
					
					 Not a single prisoner of conscience who had been detained on charges of violation of the "Security Law" was included among those freed by the pardon, it noted, adding: What Lee did deserves condemnation as it can be perpetrated only by a group of gangsters and represents the height of shamelessness.
					
					 It urged the authorities to stop suppression of human rights and the labor movement, set free the prisoners of conscience and abolish such evil laws as the "Security Law."

articles.title: S. Korean Public Official's Scandal Exposed
articles.content:
S. Korean Public Official's Scandal Exposed
						
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the policy advisor to the "minister of Unification" of south Korea appropriated a fabulous amount of money, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News on Jan. 30.
					 Last year he received 15 million won for helping a murderer get punishment as light as possible and pocketed 3 million won for enabling him to have a special reunion with his family.
					
					 Scandals have become so rampant among public officials in south Korea that they are beyond control, sparking off public uproar.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Hungary
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Hungary
						
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- A Hungarian preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Budapest on January 28.
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il in the period between February 1 and 18.

articles.title: Events Held Abroad to Mark Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Events Held Abroad to Mark Day of Shining Star 
						
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Seminars, lectures and film shows took place in Democratic Congo, Germany, Malaysia and Kuwait in the period between January 19 and 29 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Participants in the film shows watched "Wheel of Happiness" and other Korean films.
					
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo, said:
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il frustrated the intensified moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to stifle the DPRK and firmly defended the sovereignty of the country, holding aloft the banner of Songun in the whole period of his revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the genius of revolution and construction and peerlessly great man as he laid a solid foundation for building a socialist economic power, depending on ultra-modern science and technology.
					
					 The Korean people and progressive mankind of the world will always remember him.
					
					 The chief of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany in his speech highly praised the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed by turning the DPRK into a power no one can provoke.
					
					 The chairman of the Malaysian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star in a lecture noted that the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il serves as a treasured sword with which the DPRK frustrated the moves of the imperialists to stifle it and defended itself.
					
					 The chairman stressed that the DPRK proudly reached the high status of a nuclear weapons state, satellite manufacturer and launcher. It is the greatest of the exploits of Kim Jong Il who had boundless love for the people and regarded the sovereignty of the country as his life and soul, he added.
					
					 A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Germany.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Praises Exploits of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Praises Exploits of Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea dedicated a special write-up to its website on January 24 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The website in an article titled "Rare ideological and theoretical wisdom and disposition" said:
					
					 The rare ideological and theoretical wisdom of Kim Jong Il were unthinkable without his extraordinary disposition.
					
					 He possessed unusual power of observation and insight.
					
					 He grasped urgent issues raised by the times before anyone else and achieved great ideological and theoretical exploits in the course of giving scientific clarification of them.
					
					 His ability to make lucid analysis and judgment were part of his inborn disposition.
					
					 He long ago made a scientific analysis of any problem and reviewed and systematized it before making a clear conclusion.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as an integral system of idea, theory and method of Juche and authored many works clearly indicating the road to be followed by socialism. These historical facts clearly showed what rare ability to make clear analysis and judgment he possessed.
					
					 He had scientific foresight, too.
					
					 The website stressed in an article titled "Elder statesman" that he was the man who pursued most successful politics.

articles.title: Beninese Political Party Urges UNSC to Withdraw Its  "Resolution" against DPRK
articles.content:
Beninese Political Party Urges UNSC to Withdraw Its  "Resolution" against DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Benin made public a statement in support of the statements of the DPRK National Defence Commission and its Foreign Ministry on Jan. 28.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. prodded the UNSC into cooking up another "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, terming its launch of satellite for peaceful purposes "a long-range missile launch" and a "grave challenge" to the world peace and security.
					
					 In this connection, the DPRK National Defence Commission and its Foreign Ministry issued statements separately, vehemently rejecting the illegal "resolution" fabricated by the UNSC.
					
					 They also declared in their statements that the DPRK would continue exercising its independent and legitimate right to launch satellites for peaceful purposes in accordance with the universally accepted international law on the peaceful use of outer space and launch an all-out action to frustrate the hostile moves of the U.S. and its followers against the DPRK and safeguard the sovereignty of the country and the nation.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin that has always claimed global independence and fair international order urges the UNSC to immediately retract its "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin invariably supports all measures taken by the DPRK and extends firm solidarity to the heroic Korean people.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand Supported in France, Ecuador
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand Supported in France, Ecuador
						
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Organizations of France and Ecuador released statements on Jan. 26 and 27 blasting the UNSC's fabrication of a "resolution" against the DPRK.
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association said:
					
					 Entirely unreasonable is the illegal "resolution" adopted by the UNSC over the DPRK's launch of application satellite aimed at developing science and technology.
					
					 If the U.S. truly wants peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula, Northeast Asia and the rest of the world, it should roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK at once.
					
					 The Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador noted:
					
					 The DPRK, a full-fledged sovereign state and UN member nation, has the right to launch satellite in accordance with international law and defend its sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 It is quite self-evident for the DPRK to take tough steps now that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and brigandish provocations have reached an extreme phase.
					
					 The UNSC's "resolution" ignored the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 All progressives of Ecuador and the rest of the world are greatly enraged by the U.S. moves against the DPRK.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will mercilessly punish the U.S. and all other hostile forces which did harm to their dignity.

articles.title: UN, U.S. Urged to Respect DPRK's Independent Right
articles.content:
UN, U.S. Urged to Respect DPRK's Independent Right
						
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association and the Socialist Journalist Forum of Nepal in their statements on Jan. 28 said that the DPRK's satellite launch is the legitimate right of a sovereign state, urging the United Nations and the U.S. to respect the DPRK's independent right.
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association noted that satellite launch for peaceful purposes cannot be problematic under any circumstances and, on the contrary, it deserves praise from the international community for its positive contribution to the development of science and technology and wellbeing of mankind.
					
					 The UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" is an undisguised violation of the universally accepted international law and an act of wrecking the peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Asia, it said.
					
					 It fully supported the stand of the DPRK rejecting the UNSC's "resolution".
					
					 The Socialist Journalist Forum of Nepal said the U.S. and other imperialist forces talk about freedom, human rights, democracy and international law but all their acts are contrary to this.
					
					 It vehemently rejected the UNSC's "resolution" against the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and extended full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and build an economic giant.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand Favored by Bangladeshi Personage
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand Favored by Bangladeshi Personage
						
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League and chairman of the Bangladesh Self-Reliance Research Centre, released a statement on Jan. 27 supporting the statements of the DPRK National Defence Commission and its Foreign Ministry.
					 The "resolution" adopted at the UNSC with the U.S. as a main player goes to fully prove that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK has entered a new dangerous phase, he said.
					
					 The DPRK's satellite launch is its just and independent right and an exercise of its legitimate sovereignty universally recognized by international law, he noted.
					
					 He urged the UNSC to repeal at once the illegal "resolution" fabricated by it in pursuance of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK in violation of the universally accepted international law.
					
					 He extended full support to the stand of the DPRK government to develop and launch more varieties of application satellites needed for building an economic giant.

articles.title: UNSC's "Resolution" Rejected in Different Countries
articles.content:
UNSC's "Resolution" Rejected in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held by the Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association on Jan. 26 in support of the statements of the DPRK National Defence Commission and its Foreign Ministry.
					 Speakers at the meeting rejected and denounced the UNSC's "resolution" fabricated by the U.S. and its allies.
					
					 A statement denouncing the UNSC's unreasonable "resolution" was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 The statement exposed the injustice of the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK faked up by the UNSC.
					
					 The UN should preserve its Charter and impartiality and never allow the highhanded and arbitrary practices of the U.S. and other powers, it held.
					
					 The use of space for peaceful purposes is a legitimate right of each country and the hypocritical act on the part of the U.S. and its allies denying it should be stopped at once as it is the height of double standards, it stressed.
					
					 A Malaysian company held a meeting on the same day denouncing the UNSC's "resolution" which took fault with the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Slovak Social Bodies
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Slovak Social Bodies
						
 Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The Slovak Association for Supporting the Juche Idea and the Slovakia-Korea Friendship Association released a joint statement on Jan. 29 in support of the New Year Address of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We received his New Year Address with great excitement.
					
					 We were pleased indeed that the DPRK successfully launched a satellite manufactured by itself last year, holding a high position in the field of latest science and technology and proudly ranking itself among space powers. 
					
					 The Korean people are greeting the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victorious great Fatherland Liberation War this year.
					
					 We support the efforts of the Korean people to build a civilized socialist country full of beautiful and sound life style.
					
					 We hope that the Korean people will register greater successes by keeping to the road of independence, Songun and socialism under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige la reunion ampliada de Comision Militar Central del Partido
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige la reunion ampliada de Comision Militar Central del Partido
						
Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la reunion ampliada de la Comision Militar Central (CMC) del Partido del Trabajo de Corea bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC, Presidente de la CMC del PTC, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					En la ocasion participaron los miembros de la CMC del Partido y del mando operacional de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC y los comandantes de las grandes unidades combinadas, inclusive las fuerzas navales, las aereas y antiaereas y las coheteriles estrategicas.
					
					La reunion discutio el problema de producir gran viraje en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas bajo la guia del PTC sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun y el tema de organizacion.
					
					El Mariscal hizo un importante discurso resumen que servira de orientacion programatica en fortalecer mas el EPC como invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del monte Paektu acorde a las demandas del PTC y la revolucion en desarrollo y defender la seguridad y la soberania del pais.
					
					Los participantes en la reunion, que escucharon con gran emocion el discurso resumen, tomaron el firme juramento de cumplir incondicional y cabalmente las tareas combativas presentadas en el rindiendo la maxima gloria y expresando el mas calido agradecimiento a Kim Jong Un quien abre el periodo de esplendor para el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas con su extraordinaria perspicacia, estratagema e incomparable audacia, coraje y nobles virtudes.
					
					La reunion ampliada de la CMC, que sesiono en el tiempo importante en que se abre la fase trascendental en la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y el cumplimiento de la causa de reunificacion de la patria, marcara un hito importante para estimular la lucha del ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC, que convencidos y optimistas de su victoria, emprendieron la marcha general del ano nuevo, y para incrementar en todos los aspectos el poderio defensivo del pais.
